body_html:
To add to @bpiel 's comment, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients/nn_grad.cc#L65

for an example of another op (Relu) which just calls its corresponding ReluGrad op as its gradients function. You can likely do something similar for LRN.
body_text:
To add to @bpiel 's comment, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients/nn_grad.cc#L65
for an example of another op (Relu) which just calls its corresponding ReluGrad op as its gradients function. You can likely do something similar for LRN.
body:
To add to @bpiel 's comment, see https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/cc/gradients/nn_grad.cc#L65

for an example of another op (Relu) which just calls its corresponding ReluGrad op as its gradients function. You can likely do something similar for LRN.
